COMMANDS.NAME: build
COMMANDS.DESCRIPTION: Builds application using the selected type; default is release (if no value is given)

COMMANDS.NAME: resource-update
COMMANDS.DESCRIPTION: Manually updates resource folder on target directory; if no value is given, both targets will be updated

COMMANDS.NAME: clean
COMMANDS.DESCRIPTION: Removes target directories if target value is given or target, lib and include directories if all value is given; default is target (if no value is given)
